SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: Absolutely terrifying/disgusting, and feel for them and there families... but the time to take action is now...so we've been sitting on our backsides hoping ISIS will just go away and it hasn't worked, rightousness doesn't stop blades or bullets. We need to take back control of our borders from europe. If we get kicked out of it then we do. At least then we can work towards creating a safe country to live in. Europe won't protect us, trade is great but they cannot have this much control over this country when they wont defend or protect us.
The time to act is now... i seriously do think it is time for 'revenge'
Our people have been murdered in cold blood on a beach, they never did ANYONE HARM.
Makes my blood boiling... knowing Cameron/idiot won't do anything the guys all (dreams & Talks)

I would not compound the initial evil by ordering the murder of innocents. To do that would be to get in the gutter with the killer of the tourists. Revenge is only defensible when it's taken on the perpetrator and/or his sponsors. If somebody from the Cotswolds killed my family, would I be justified in dropping a bomb on the Cotswolds? Or on anybody who came from the Cotswolds? Surely not.
